tweets.content: @okfnedu: Cultural #opendata and #openaccess as an alternative for open data, interesting challenges for #museums & #libraries at #IODC16 #culturepic.twitter.com/iyA2sN6hIk

session.description: The event is aimed to raise awareness among Spanish Public cultural memory institutions of information reuse along with the importance to adopt an strategic approach to deal with open data projects.

conference_notes:
The event is aimed to raise awareness among Spanish Public cultural memory institutions of information reuse along with the importance to adopt an strategic approach to deal with open data projects. The International Open Data Conference provides a good opportunity to discuss the different issues and cases studies in the cultural field. Objectives:
  • – Explore different models and deepen the understanding and its impact to assess its implementation.
  • – Enhance different private sector initiatives, both Spanish and international, of cultural information reuse, as well as measure their economic impact.
  • – Create a discussion forum which lays on the table a common policy for Spanish cultural institutions.
name: Open Data and Culture
